projectName.description: Application name in your workspace, e.g. 'platform'

serviceName.description: Service name is the name of the service, match with the entity name usually

repositoryName.description: Repository name, must match with entity name, e.g. 'user'

entityName.description: Entity name, must match the class name, that is exported from entity file, e.g. 'User'

groupName.description: Group name is folder name that you want to generate your entity in it e.g. 'users'
groupName.x-prompt: What is group name for generation? group names should be with dashes, e.g. user-group. Leave empty if you want to use root repository directory

tenantBaseService.description: It's indicating that this entity is tenant base service or not, so we can choose the appropriate base service for generation
tenantBaseService.x-prompt: Is this a tenant base service? (y/n)
